name: Yusho's Gin & Tonic
description: Alex Bachman's outstanding Old Tom-based Gin & Tonic features tonic syrup he makes from scratch. He's keeping the recipe under wraps for now—Yusho is all but a couple of months old, after all. Bachman recommends this recipe from Imbibe magazine, or you can use this recipe from Serious Eats.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a 10-ounce rocks glass with ice. Add gin and tonic syrup and fill with club soda. Garnish with lime.
